revised_title: Nonlinear Decay of Electron Plasma Waves: Ion Cyclotron Wave Generation
tldr: This article explores the nonlinear behavior of electron plasma waves and their decay into ion cyclotron waves in a magnetic field. The authors describe experimental results and related theory, focusing on the specific case of ion cyclotron modes. They demonstrate a method of exciting these modes without also exciting ion acoustic modes, allowing for the identification of the decay product waves.
